title: Can you be afraid of loud noises for no reason? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. It's called Misophoneia. It's not that uncommon. Antidepressants, therapy and noise cancelling headphones are all options. One of my kids has it as a result of an anxiety disorder. It's manageable, especially if it's diagnosed formally. Kids who suffer from it are generally allowed to wear headphones in class. If you're an adult you might want to make career choices that take you to quiet or serene locations.
